name: NumPuzzle: Number Puzzle
description:
Enjoy NumPuzzle! the classic number puzzle game! Challenge your brain and use logic to move the wood numbers tiles into the right place. Slide the numbers into order, boost your IQ, and have fun with this relaxing but brain challenging game!

You’ll get a set of wooden tiles with numbers on them, and a single empty space. The object is to shift the tiles into the right order. You can slide tiles into the empty space, and step by step move all the numbers into the right place.

Whether you remember this fun game from childhood, or you’ve never played it before, come get smarter with NumPuzzle!
